chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Your Response:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

Your Response:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
Y: Type
X: Type
f: X -> Y
g: Y -> X
f_inj: injective f
g_inj: injective g

Goal:
forall y : Y, CSB_bijection (CSB_bijection2 y) = y

Premises:
CSB_bijection2 = fun y : Y => match classic_dec (Y_even y) with | left _ => g y | right ne => proj1_sig (finv_noteven y ne) end : Y -> X
injective = fun (U V : Type) (f : U -> V) => forall x y : U, f x = f y -> x = y : forall U V : Type, (U -> V) -> Prop Arguments injective {U V}%type_scope _%function_scope
CSB_bijection = fun x : X => match classic_dec (X_odd x) with | left o => proj1_sig (ginv_odd x o) | right _ => f x end : X -> Y
ZifyClasses.inj_ok : forall i : ZifyClasses.injterm, ?I (ZifyClasses.source i) = ZifyClasses.target i where ?S : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?T : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?I : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- ?S -> ?T]
FunctionalExtensionality.eta_expansion : forall f0 : ?A -> ?B, f0 = (fun x : ?A => f0 x) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type]
FunctionalExtensionality.eta_expansion_dep : forall f0 : forall x : ?A, ?B x, f0 = (fun x : ?A => f0 x) where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?B : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- ?A -> Type]
eq_sig_rec : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Set, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Y : Type f : X ->...-> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig_rect : forall Q : ?u = ?v -> Type, (forall (p : proj1_sig ?u = proj1_sig ?v) (q : eq_rect (proj1_sig ?u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig ?u) (proj1_sig ?v) p = proj2_sig ?v), Q (eq_sig ?u ?v p q)) -> forall p : ?u = ?v, Q p where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- ?A -> Prop] ?u : [X : Type Y : Type f : X ->...-> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- {a : ?A | ?P a}]
eq_sig : forall (u v : {a : ?A | ?P a}) (p : proj1_sig u = proj1_sig v), eq_rect (proj1_sig u) (fun a : ?A => ?P a) (proj2_sig u) (proj1_sig v) p = proj2_sig v -> u = v where ?A : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- Type] ?P : [X : Type Y : Type f : X -> Y g : Y -> X f_inj : injective f g_inj : injective g |- ?A -> Prop]
Inductive X_odd : X -> Prop := g_Y_even : forall y : Y, Y_even y -> X_odd (g y) with Y_even : Y -> Prop := not_f_img : forall y : Y, (forall x : X, f x <> y) -> Y_even y | f_X_odd : forall x : X, X_odd x -> Y_even (f x) Arguments not_f_img _ _%function_scope
surjective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => forall y : Y, exists x : X, f x = y : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments surjective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
bijective = fun (X Y : Type) (f : X -> Y) => injective f /\ surjective f : forall X Y : Type, (X -> Y) -> Prop Arguments bijective {X Y}%type_scope _%function_scope
finv_noteven : forall y : Y, ~ Y_even y -> {x : X | f x = y}
ginv_odd : forall x : X, X_odd x -> {y : Y | g y = x}
not_injective_elim : forall (U V : Type) (f : U -> V), ~ injective f -> exists x y : U, f x = f y /\ x <> y
BinInt.Z.max_monotone : forall f : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful BinInt.Z.le BinInt.Z.le) f -> forall x y : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.max (f x) (f y) = f (BinInt.Z.max x y)
injective_preserves_cardinal : forall (U V : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (n : nat), injective f -> cardinal U A n -> forall n' : nat, cardinal V (Im U V A f) n' -> n' = n
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimonotone : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
BinInt.Z.max_mono : forall f : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful BinInt.Z.le BinInt.Z.le) f -> forall x y : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.max (f x) (f y) = f (BinInt.Z.max x y)
PeanoNat.Nat.min_max_antimono : forall f : nat -> nat, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful le (Basics.flip le)) f -> forall x y : nat, PeanoNat.Nat.min (f x) (f y) = f (PeanoNat.Nat.max x y)
Ring_theory.Computational : forall (R : Type) (req : R -> R -> Prop) (reqb : R -> R -> bool), (forall x y : R, reqb x y = true -> req x y) -> Ring_theory.ring_kind
ClassicalFacts.excluded_middle_imp_representative_boolean_partition : ClassicalFacts.excluded_middle -> forall R : bool -> bool -> Prop, RelationClasses.Equivalence R -> exists f : bool -> bool, forall x : bool, R x (f x) /\ (forall y : bool, R x y -> f x = f y)
In_Image_elim : forall (U V : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V), injective f -> forall x : U, In V (Im U V A f) (f x) -> In U A x
Im_inv : forall (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (y : V), In V (Im U V X f) y -> exists x : U, In U X x /\ f x = y
Pigeonhole : forall (U V : Type) (A : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) (n : nat), cardinal U A n -> forall n' : nat, cardinal V (Im U V A f) n' -> n' < n -> ~ injective f
Inductive Im (U V : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (f : U -> V) : Ensemble V := Im_intro : forall x : U, In U X x -> forall y : V, y = f x -> In V (Im U V X f) y Arguments Im (_ _)%type_scope _ _%function_scope Arguments Im_intro (_ _)%type_scope _ _%function_scope
cardinal_unicity : forall (U : Type) (X : Ensemble U) (n : nat), cardinal U X n -> forall m : nat, cardinal U X m -> n = m
BinPos.Pos.compare_spec : forall x y : BinNums.positive, CompareSpec (x = y) (BinPos.Pos.lt x y) (BinPos.Pos.lt y x) (BinPos.Pos.compare x y)
BinInt.Z.eq_stepl : forall x y z : BinNums.Z, x = y -> x = z -> z = y
ClassicalFacts.or_elim_redl : forall (A B C : Prop) (f : A -> C) (g : B -> C) (a : A), f a = or_ind f g (or_introl a)
Eqdep_dec.eq_dep_eq_dec : forall A : Type, (forall x y : A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> forall (P : A -> Type) (p : A) (x y : P p), eq_dep A P p x p y -> x = y
Inductive Zis_gcd (a b g : BinNums.Z) : Prop := Zis_gcd_intro : BinInt.Z.divide g a -> BinInt.Z.divide g b -> (forall x : BinNums.Z, BinInt.Z.divide x a -> BinInt.Z.divide x b -> BinInt.Z.divide x g) -> Znumtheory.Zis_gcd a b g Arguments Znumtheory.Zis_gcd (_ _ _)%Z_scope Arguments Znumtheory.Zis_gcd_intro (_ _ _)%Z_scope _ _ _%function_scope
BinPos.Pos.max_r : forall x y : BinNums.positive, BinPos.Pos.le x y -> BinPos.Pos.max x y = y

```coq
intros y.
unfold CSB_bijection2.
destruct (classic_dec (Y_even y)) as [Hy_even | Hy_not_even].
- apply f_inj.
  unfold CSB_bijection.
  destruct (classic_dec (X_odd (g y))) as [H_odd | H_not_odd].
  + apply proj1_sig_eq; auto.
  + rewrite Hy_even in H_not_odd.
    contradiction.
- unfold CSB_bijection.
  destruct (finv_noteven y Hy_not_even) as [x Hfx].
  rewrite Hfx.
  destruct (classic_dec (X_odd x)) as [Hx_odd | Hx_not_odd].
  + destruct (ginv_odd x Hx_odd) as [y' Hgxy'].
    rewrite Hgxy' in Hfx.
    apply f_inj in Hfx.
    subst; contradiction.
  + rewrite Hfx.
    reflexivity.
Qed.
```

original: intros y. unfold CSB_bijection2. destruct (classic_dec (Y_even y)) as [Hy_even | Hy_not_even]. - apply f_inj. unfold CSB_bijection. destruct (classic_dec (X_odd (g y))) as [H_odd | H_not_odd]. + apply proj1_sig_eq; auto. + rewrite Hy_even in H_not_odd. contradiction. - unfold CSB_bijection. destruct (finv_noteven y Hy_not_even) as [x Hfx]. rewrite Hfx. destruct (classic_dec (X_odd x)) as [Hx_odd | Hx_not_odd]. + destruct (ginv_odd x Hx_odd) as [y' Hgxy']. rewrite Hgxy' in Hfx. apply f_inj in Hfx. subst; contradiction. + rewrite Hfx. reflexivity.
